WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I'm using SQL Server 2016 Management Studio v.17 and received the following message when attempting to import an SSIS package within Integration Services Catalog"

__TITLE: SQL Server Integration Services
------------------------------

The connection type "AzureStorage" specified for connection manager "connection name" is not recognized as a valid connection manager type. This error is returned when an attempt is made to create a connection____ manager for an unknown connection type. Check the spelling in the connection type name."
__

The SSIS package runs fine through SQL Server Agent and Visual Studio 2015.  I've downloaded the __Azure Feature Pack for Integration Services 
____

Is there another patch for SSMS? that I don't know of?

Thank you
